short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide items without an ETV of $0.00 or no ETV showing. Only works if you also have the Vine Helper installed and displaying the ETV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tiny addon does only 1 thing - adds a checkbox that hides any NON $0.00 ETV items after the page loads. It requires you have the Vine Helper addon installed and configured to display the ETV. If you check the box in the green tab, the next time you load a page of results all the items without a $0.00 ETV will hide. Uncheck the box and reload the page and you'll see the items again. It uses local storage (kind of like a cookie) to store the checked/unchecked value of the checkbox so it will remember how you set it last.

If you like this extension and feel like making a small donation to encourage the developer to keep making cool free things like this please click here:
https://www.paypal.com/donate?token=wgbqOV5XFnTbQQ_xq39dBsL4WTItGDWAUkczw3xPDNeJ5k8aHJfBuMhug4mIC9YMaAG_SGQ_BCkScPwz&locale.x=US

9/26/24
Added code to checkbox listener to reload page when checkbox state changes. Added slightly longer wait after page loads before hiding items.

9/27/24
Added a second checkbox to hide items with no ETV. First tab no longer hides those. Tabs are now labeled.

9/30/24
Fixed HNEZ incorrectly hiding items with no ETV when checking the hide $0.00 ETV checkbox.
